function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of timely warning to the public about the outbreak","Impact":"Increased spread of the disease and public panic","Mitigation":"Establishing rapid communication channels and crisis management plans","Technologies":"Communication technology for mass notifications","People":"Public, travelers, and individuals at risk of exposure","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Government decision making based on political interests and social stability rather than public health","Impact":"Delay in outbreak management and spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Separating public health decision making from political interests, prioritizing public health in decision making","Technologies":"Data analytics for evidence-based decision making","People":"Public, individuals at risk, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, public health advocates, and medical experts"},{"Description":"Delay in government control measures due to balancing political, stability, and economic factors","Impact":"Ineffective suppression of the epidemic and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Establishing clear protocols for public health emergencies and crisis management","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and simulation tools","People":"Public, individuals at risk, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and public health organizations"}]}
